# rrrr_ntk_analyzer

Neural Tangent Kernel eigenvalue decomposition into 4D lattice products for architecture analysis

## Installation

```bash
pip install -e .
```

## Usage

```python
from rrrr_ntk_analyzer import create_rrrr_ntk_analyzer

instance = create_rrrr_ntk_analyzer()
instance.run()
```
